Recent updates from New York City include a tragic rise in violent incidents, with multiple shootings and stabbings reported, alongside a significant subway surfing accident resulting in fatalities. Additionally, the city is addressing public safety and infrastructure issues, including a partial building collapse and new regulations for basement apartments.

### Emergencies & Risks

Recent violent incidents in New York City have raised concerns about public safety.

- Bronx man, 35, shot point-blank in the head near a deli, resulting in his death. ### Civic Information

NYC is now accepting applications for basement and backyard apartments, offering new housing opportunities.

- The initiative aims to increase affordable housing options across the city. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)  
- Applicants must meet specific criteria to qualify for the program. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)  
- The program is part of a broader effort to address housing shortages in New York City. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
